mapper.update: UPDATE CourseInfo SET courseName = #{courseName}, courseClassification = #{courseClassification}, credit = #{credit}, theory = #{theory}, practice = #{practice}, summary = #{summary} WHERE classNumber = ${classNumber}
mapper.select: SELECT classNumber, courseName, courseClassification, credit, theory, practice, summary FROM CourseInfo WHERE classNumber = #{classNumber}
SELECT classNumber, courseName, courseClassification, credit, theory, practice, summary FROM CourseInfo ORDER BY classNumber LIMIT #{startNum},#{count}
SELECT classNumber, courseName, courseClassification, credit, theory, practice, summary FROM CourseInfo ORDER BY classNumber
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CourseInfo (classNumber, courseName, courseClassification, credit, theory, practice, summary) VALUES (#{classNumber},#{courseName},#{courseClassification},#{credit},#{theory},#{practice},#{summary})
